attributes.action: Re-invent parliament, and dissolve the civil service which costs millions every year
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Every Year, the government takes revenue from taxes on the people.  A lot of these taxes go into the coffers of the civil service, Who have been there for years.  A government changes, but the civil service do not change. They have secretaries, under-secretaries...ad infinitum.  An MP should only need one secretary, no spin doctors (as they are part of the civil service), and if that secretary goes on holiday, the MP should type up their own notes.  After all we elected them to represent us, so they should do some graft as well as having a very PC argument in the house of commons.
